QuestData.Title: No Rest For The Wicked
QuestData.Description: It's Alumeth... He's growing in power again. I can sense it. Again his underlings are channeling power to his soul.$b$bIf he's allowed to rest, their efforts will soon transform him into a mighty adversary.$b$bReturn to his chamber in the north portion of Aldur'thar. Combine his heart, skull, scepter and robes, then use his remains on the crystal there.$b$bHurry, $r! Destroy him before he becomes any more powerful!
QuestData.LogDescription: Thassarian, aboard the Skybreaker, wants you to defeat Alumeth the Ascended at Aldur'thar.
QuestData.CompletionText: Well, friend? Were you successful against Alumeth?
QuestData.RewardText: Alumeth has suffered a sound defeat, but I sense that his spirit still lingers...
